The Definitive Tap Water Safety Guide For World Cities

Not sure if the tap water is safe to drink in a city you’re traveling to?

Don’t get sick when traveling for work or for vacation!

Check:

  • - Is it safe to drink?
  • - What do locals do?
  • - What are the local convenience stores?
  • - How much does a bottle of water cost?

Can You Drink Tap Water In…?

“Can You Drink Tap Water In…?” it provides the most up to date and straight forward answers to your questions about the safety of drinking tap water in the most popular travel destinations.

In addition to reports about water safety, we also provide reports for the water source for most cities, treatment methods, and specific tests that have been passed or failed.

You can search for a specific city using the search bar on every page or feel free to peruse our listings below, sorted by country and region.

If you have found a spelling error, please, notify us by selecting that text and pressing Ctrl+Enter.
